title: App Shell and Routing Initialization
description: Verify that the app shell loads correctly with proper routing and layout including header and footer, and 404 page displays for unknown routes.

steps.description: Navigate to http://localhost:5174
Check that the app shell loads without errors and displays header and footer
Click on Top navigation links: Home, Dashboard, Pricing, Login, one by one
Verify each route loads the corresponding page
Navigate to a non-existing route (e.g., /nonexistentpage)
Verify the 404 page is displayed

title: Login Page UI and Plan-Based Feature Locking
description: Verify login page UI renders with email and password fields and submit button and dashboard correctly shows locked states for features not available on current plan.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login page
Check that email and password input fields and submit button are present
Mock login with different plan contexts: Free, Starter, Pro, Premium
Navigate to Dashboard page with each mocked plan
Verify that features not included in the plan show locked states or locked UI

title: Debt Calculator Inputs and Outputs Validation
description: Check debt calculator Lite inputs accept income, expenses, debts array and outputs correct disposable income and naive payoff estimate with validation and local state persistence.

steps.description: Navigate to Debt Calculator Lite page
Input valid values for income, expenses, and a debts array with principal, interest rate, and minimum payment
Verify disposable income and naive payoff estimates are calculated and displayed
Input invalid or missing values for fields
Verify validation error messages appear and calculation does not proceed
Reload the page
Verify inputs retain last state from local persistence

title: Payment Tracker Add, Edit, Delete, and Summary
description: Verify payments can be added, edited, deleted in-memory and monthly sum summary updates accordingly.

steps.description: Navigate to Payment Tracker page
Add new payments with valid data
Verify new payments appear in list and monthly summary updates with correct sum
Edit an existing payment with updated data
Verify list and monthly summary reflect the edited payment changes
Delete a payment
Verify payment is removed from the list and monthly summary updates accordingly

title: Analytics and DTI Calculation View with Plan-Based Access
description: Verify DTI calculation and basic charts render properly with sample data and free plan limits data shown whereas higher plans show full data.

steps.description: Navigate to Analytics and DTI calculation page
Load sample data sets
Verify that DTI calculation view is displayed and 1-2 charts render without error
Switch plan context to Free
Verify charts only show limited data
Switch plan context to Starter or higher
Verify charts show full dataset

title: PWA Manifest and Accessibility Compliance
description: Verify presence and correct referencing of manifest.webmanifest and icons, and that accessibility issues reported by TestSprite are resolved including labels, alt texts and roles, passing Lighthouse accessibility checks.

steps.description: Check that public/manifest.webmanifest file exists and linked in index.html
Verify basic icons are referenced properly in manifest and HTML
Run TestSprite accessibility audit
Verify all label, alt text, and roles accessibility issues are fixed
Run Lighthouse accessibility audit
Verify accessibility score is at least 90

title: UI/UX Branding and Visual Enhancements
description: Verify that VAYRA branding (logo, favicon, slogan) is consistent across the app, branded color palette and typography applied, hero section displays catchy headline and CTAs, blurred previews for locked features appear, testimonials auto-rotate, smooth animations run on transitions, and accessibility passes including visible inputs and aria-labels.

steps.description: Open the homepage and dashboard pages
Verify the logo, favicon, and slogan appear correctly
Verify color palette is used as per brand guidelines (soft pastel + premium accent)
Verify typography matches premium fonts specified
Verify hero section displays headline and call-to-action buttons
Verify blurred preview cards are shown for locked Pro features in dashboard
Verify testimonials auto-rotate with realistic global names
Verify smooth animations on page/component transitions
Verify accessibility attributes on inputs, aria-labels, and alt texts

title: Pro Modules Functionality and Advanced Visuals
description: Validate Debt Breakdown with enhanced visuals, Advanced Analytics with minimum payments and estimated debt-free times, Premium Payoff Strategy graphs, review section gated for Pro users, and enhanced chart features including tooltips and animations.

steps.description: Set plan context to Pro or Premium
Navigate to Debt Breakdown, Advanced Analytics, and Payoff Planner modules
Verify Debt Breakdown displays enhanced visuals correctly
Verify Advanced Analytics shows minimum payments and estimated debt-free time calculations
Verify Premium Payoff Strategy graphs render as waterfall/line hybrid with gradients, tooltips, and animations
Navigate to Leave a Review section
Verify Leave a Review is visible only for Pro or higher plans
Switch plan context to Free or Starter
Verify Leave a Review section is not visible
Navigate to About Us page
Verify About Us page displays VAYRA brand information as trustworthy debt support

title: AI Copilot and Assistant Functionality with Multilingual Support
description: Test AI sidebar visibility across Pro modules, context-aware prompts, plan-based restrictions on AI usage, multilingual support defaults and fallbacks, and helpful AI responses with financial advice and motivation.

steps.description: Set user plan to Pro or Premium
Verify AI Copilot sidebar is visible in supported modules
Trigger context-aware prompts for debt planning, budgeting, and payoff suggestions
Verify AI responses provide relevant financial advice and motivational tips
Switch user plan to Free or Starter
Verify AI usage is limited according to plan gating
Change app language to English and verify default
Verify AI prompts and responses respect multilingual setup and fallbacks

title: Pricing Matrix, Grandfathered Users, and Upgrade CTA Verification
description: Verify pricing data is sourced from pricing.json, plan gating respects this data, grandfathered users see original price and badge, upgrade call-to-action displays correct perks and prices, and pricing page reflects accurate feature comparisons.

steps.description: Load the Pricing page
Verify pricing matrix reflects the data defined in pricing.json including feature comparisons
Set user as grandfathered with locked original price
Verify the grandfathered badge is displayed and price is locked
Trigger upgrade CTA for each plan
Verify upgrade CTA shows correct perks and prices for target plan
Verify plan gating enforces access based on pricing.json data

title: Offline Mode and Sync Functionality
description: Test service worker caches shell and key routes, offline mode banner appearance, queueing writes while offline, sync on reconnect with conflict resolution, and correct manifest icons and PWA install behavior.

steps.description: Load the app and verify service worker registration
Simulate offline mode in browser
Verify offline banner is displayed
Attempt to add/edit/delete data (e.g., payments) while offline
Verify actions are queued and not lost
Simulate reconnecting to network
Verify queued actions are synced correctly and conflict resolution occurs if needed
Verify manifest icons and Apple touch icon are present and correct
Test app install prompt for PWA
Verify PWA install flow works without errors

title: CI/CD Pipeline and Pre-Deploy QA Validation
description: Ensure GitHub Actions workflow installs dependencies, builds the project, runs Vitest unit tests and TestSprite E2E tests, passes lint and type checks, produces error-free production bundle and validates all critical paths.

steps.description: Trigger GitHub Actions CI workflow
Verify that workflow passes install, build, and Vitest unit tests stages
Verify that TestSprite E2E tests pass successfully
Verify no linting or type checking errors occur
Verify production build artefacts are generated without errors
Verify that all critical user flows and functionality are tested in CI environment
